div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die mensis Septembris Anno quo Supra

Eodem die Willelmus blinsel gareauche senior fecit constituit creauit
et nominavit Willelmum blinsel suum legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem et
nuncium specialem ad prosequendum patricium leslie pro naulo certj
Cinerum et in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum concernentibus agend' defendend'
promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
Colisone forspekar that patrik leslie sal pay xij s' of fraucht
to thomas hay

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis Septembris quo Supra

The saide day Alexander chamer aldirman this yer bigane present
his compt' of the commone gudis resavit be him Ande thir
personis vndir writin sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' Robert blinsel
Jonhne of Cullane Jonhne Colisone and thomas prat
was chosin Auditoris

the saide day Alexander Rede forspekar for Jonet parfyt offerit hir
redy to abid' ande vndirlie the declaracioun of ane assis'
of the best and worthiast of this tone anent ale thingis that Alane
Cordonar and his wyf hed till follow hir for thame Selff and
for thar barne that he said' was dede

the saide day Alane Cordonare saide he was redy with his
witnes to follow the said' Jonet

Eodem die Andreas lousone amerciatur per confessionem lingue proprie pro perturbio
Willelmi lammyntone Et Idem Willelmus amerciatur per assisam pro perturbio
dicti andree in verbo et quilibet eorum alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt
Et aliquis ipsorum alterum perturbauerit in postrum et inde conuictus fuerit
soluet fabrice ecclesie xl s' et hoc ex ore David mar' prelocutoris assise vtraque
parte prius obligata ad standum ordinacioni assise

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid mar'
forspekar that Ingerame lidall is feit mane to Jonhne of Retre
for ane yer' and aw to mak him seruice and Androw Culan balye chargit
the saide Ingerame to mak seruice to the saide Jonhne in his bot
eftir the deliuerance of the said' assis'

div.head: Hede Court at michaelmes'
div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis Octobris Anno Domini Mo cccco nonagesimo sexto

The saide day It was statut ordanit and deliuerit
be the aldirman and consale that the aldirman for the tyme
sal expone thar' commone gudis in thar' commone vys'
and profit Ande quhen thar commone gudis ar' disponit he
sal nocht Superexpende nor' draw the tone in dett
forthir thane thar' avne commone gudis extendis to and
gif he dois he sale ansuer' for it him Self and nocht
the tone

The said' day the aldirman balyeis and consall Ratifeit confirmit
ande appreuit that nay burges be maid' within this burghe' for
tua yeris yeit to Cum within x li' excepe burges sonnis
and thai that mareis burges douchteris eftir the tenouris of the
act maid' tharapone obefor this day was ane yer'

Eodem die Johannes Ruthirfurd' miles electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro Anno Instanti prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die thomas fyf Andreas Culane senior thomas leslie
et Robertus Culane electi fuerunt in Officium balliuorum prestitis
Solitis Juramentis pro Anno Instante

Eodem die Philippus Dunbrek Andreas Nachtj Jacobus
leis et marcus scot electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum pro anno
Instante prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister laurencius pyot
procurator venerabilis virj magistri Duncanj scherar' Canonici abirdonensis patronique
altaris beati Andree apostoli infra ecclesiam Cathedralem abirdonensis situati et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu duarum marcarum
annuatim sibi et dicto altarj debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra
dictum burgum in le hukistarraw inter terram Roberti nich evinsone ex orientali
et terram Willelmi Nicholsone ex occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis sacculo presentavit in Curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus georgio brovne Alexandro brabner' et
Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Kynnin
mond Capellanus altaris beate Katherine virginis infra ecclesiam parochialem
Cathedralem abirdonensis situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu xxx d' v s' sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito de quodam crofto
vasto Jacente ex occidentali parte vie regie qua Itur ad le p bolbrig
inter terram martinj Kemp ex australi ex vna et Croftum priorum
et conuentus fratrum predicatorum huius burgi ex boreali partibus ab altera
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus
testibus Andrea hall alexandro mernoche et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus et Religiosus vir frater
Dauid Andirsones prior domus fratrum predicatorum burgi de Abirdene
nomine tocius conuentus eiusdem et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditus decim solidorum de terra quondam valteri thomsone
Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Alexandri gray ex australi ex vna Et terram quondam thome gillespy ex
boriali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichile reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Roberto Derr
Thoma philp et marco scot sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus ac Religiosus vir frater
Dauid Andirsone prior domus fratrum predicatorum burgi de Abirdene
nomine procuratorio eiusdem domus et protestatus fuit in forma Juris
pro vno annuo Redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum de quadam terra
vasta quondam Roberti club Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam thome Waus ex orientali ex vna
Et terram olim henricj tulidef ex occidentalj partibus ab altera
Ad quam terram accedens nichile reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Roberto Der' thoma findelay and marco
scot sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid liell procurator discreti viri
magistri themannj crab et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
quadraginta denariorum vsualis monete scocie a longo tempore debit'
et non solut' de quadam terra vasta quondam Roberti club Jacente in
vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam
thome Waus ex orientali ex vna Et terram olim henricj tulidef
ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichile reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit
in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Roberto Der thoma findelay et marco
scot sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Willelmus
crukschank capellanus altaris beatj Duthacj Situati infra
ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicolaij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem

div.head: Septimo die mensis Octobris Anno Dominj Mo nonagesimo Sexto
div.p:
Curia gilde burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
septimo vijo die mensis Octobris anno quo Supra

The saide day gilbert menyeis grantit he hed' causit to arrest
vij barrelis of iij pipis of wyne pertening to tousane franchman
to the releving of him and his fadir for the Souerte that thai ar'
bundin to our Souerane lordis hienes and to the seref of Abirdene
for the agane cuming of his Schipe vndir the pane of ijc crovnis
and thomas Waus grantit to pay vj barrelis Salmond' to the saide
tousane or his factouris sua that the saide arrest war' lousit to
him and philp Dunbrek officiaris grant he arrestit the saide
wyne at commavnd' of the balyes' for the caus' forsaid'

div.head: Consilium
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchill
Alexander menyeis
Robertus blinsell
Alexander Rede
Johannes Cullane
Johannes Colisone
Thomas prat
Johannes Wormet
Alexander chamer filius
gilbertus menyes
Dauid menyeis
Dauid mathesone
Androw murray eldar
James Colisone
Robert crag
Alexander gray
Williame blinsele
Williame futhes

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert
blinsele forspekar that thomas Waus sal pay vj barrellis of Sal
mond' to mery obrey factouris to tousane franchman aftir the tenour' of his
obligacion

The saide day gilbert menyeis requirit the balyeis be virtew of thar
office to ger' arrest the said' Sex barrelis of Salmond' to the Relevin
of his fadir and him of the caucion that thai ar' bundin to tile
our' Souerane lordis hienes for the agane Cumin of the Schip
of the saide tousane

The saide day gilbert menyeis and Dauid theman grant thame souerte
and dettouris to Alexander blinsel for x li' and xv s' for v barrelis salmonde
sauld' and deliuerit to gilbert Riburne Ande the said' gilbert
grantit him aving the saide Some and to Releiwe the saide
gilbert and Dauid Ande the said balyeis chargit the saide gilbert and
and Dauid to pay the saide money within terme of law Alsua
thai chargit the said' gilbert Riburne to releiwe and freithe
the saidez gilbert menyeis and David within terme of law of the
Said' Some

James Kennartj eldar
Dauid theman
Dauid spens
Jonhne thomsone
Williame andirsone yongar
Richerd litstar
Williame andirsone eldar
Alexander Nachtj
Donald' Srathachin
Jonhne lundoris

In evin quartar Philp Dunbrek sergeand'
Williame Spruty and laurence tailyour' cunnaris
In Crukit quartar Androw nachtj sergeand'
Richard bernys and Donald' andirsone Cunnaris
In greyne quartar mark Scot sergeand'
Alexander stabillar and Alexander fynne Cunnaris
In futy quartar James leis sergeand'
Ricard talyour and mathow tod' Cunnaris

Alexander chamer Alexander menyeis Robert blinsele Alexander Rede Johne
of Culane thomas prat and Jonhne Wormet

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem decimo die mensis Octobris quo supra

The saide day Androw lousone grantit him avand' to androw murray
eldar four pundis vsual money of scotland to be pait be fasterinevin
next to Cum

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Williame
blinsel forspekar that William tait Robert mathosone and Jonhne
barkar was feit with Jonhne Culane to mak seruice in his
fysche boit for ane yer' and he to pay tham at four' termes and to
serue him quhile xv dais eftir the next pasche Alexander Kennoche
grantit the said' condicion maid' be him

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die octobris
quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next Cumis to Jonhne
ramsay to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be Robert Culan
for the wranguis' Intrometing vpstriking ande drinkin of ane part
of ane pip of wyne of his and avche to reconpens' him the skathis

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and consale
that ale Candilmakaris of this burghe' sale haue Candile to sele
dry wekit and smale the pvnd' of wecht weyand to be sauld'
for iij s' vndir the pane of law

The saide day Jonhne elleot franchman tuk to preiwe with Jonhne symon low
and peir' mallouris and per' delayland' that Jonhne Wormet was avand' him
j barrel of Salmond' and ordanit him to tak it

The saide day ane Richt Worschipfule mane mastir Walter leslie parsone
of menniuyr for him Self and forspekar for Elizibeth' leslie his
sistir present in the Court requerit and chargit Androw Culane yongar thar'
nevoy to deliuer' al gudis of arschip and vthiris beand' in his
possessione pertening to frer' Alexander Symsone thar Cosing to frer
Dauid andirsone priour of the freris predicatouris of this burghe to the
profit of the said palce And the said frer Alexander askit to be
dischargit of Curatory be the said Androw quhilk peticion the
said Androw vndirstanding consonant to resone with avis' of the
frendis of the saide frer Alexander present for the tyme dischargit him
of the saide office of Curatory nov and foreuire Alsua the said
frer Alexander requirit and ordanit the saide androw to deliuer ale his gudis to
the saide priour'

the saide day Williame glassinwricht grantit him to haue resavit
fra Alexander Rede mastir of the kirk werk xxij markis and x s' for the making
of tua glassin windouis to the triangile and sua Restis avand to him
xvj s' and viij d'

the saide day gilbert menyeis gravntit him aving ij moy Salt thomas
mar' ij moy Salt and gilbert Riburne j moy of Salt to the mastir of
the franche schip callit the yebeill

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die
octobris quo Supra

The saide day Alexander sanquhar grantit him aving to Dauid Spens ij
treis and j li' wax to be pait within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo
die Octobris anno quo Supra

The saide day gilbert menyeis and Dauid theman oblist thame
coniunctlie and Seueralie be the fathtis of thar bodiis to pay to Alexander
blinsele x li' and xv s' vsuale money of Scotland' within xx dais
next hereftir And' gilbert riburne oblist him be the fatht of his bodie
to releywe the saidez gilbert and Dauid of the saide Somez'
